mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where your sense of entitlement is our top priority!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-I once demanded a full refund from a restaurant because they didn't have my favorite brand of bottled water. When they refused, I threw a fit, threatened to call my lawyer, and vowed to never eat there again. The best part? I got my refund, a gift card, and a public apology. Because, really, who doesn't stock Hot Josh's water of choice?
